results.title: Is Metformin a Possible Beneficial Treatment for Psoriasis? A Scoping Review
results.text_hl: Good results have been achieved with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Psoriasis @DISEASE_MESH:D011565 @@@psoriasis@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Metabolic_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D024821 @@@metabolic syndrome@@@, for both @DISEASE_Psoriasis @DISEASE_MESH:D011565 @@@psoriasis@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Metabolic_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D024821 @@@metabolic syndrome@@@.

results.title: The potential effect of metformin on cognitive and other symptom dimensions in patients with schizophrenia and antipsychotic-induced weight gain: a systematic review, meta-analysis, and meta-regression
results.text_hl: Not only has @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ previously shown to be effective in reducing @<m>DISEASE_Metabolic_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D024821 @@@MetS@@@, but it is also considered a low-cost drug, with a well-known safety profile.
